<A NAME="eolPage123"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(5)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	the procedure under the program for determining a reasonable rate of interest;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(6)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	the types of collateral which may secure a Participant loan; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(7)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	the events constituting default and the steps that will be taken to preserve Plan assets in the event such default.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Such Participant Loan Program shall be contained in a separate written document which, when properly executed, is hereby incorporated by reference and made a part of the Plan. Furthermore, such Participant Loan Program may be modified or amended in writing from time to time without the necessity of amending this Plan.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Loan default.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;Notwithstanding anything in this Plan to the contrary, if a Participant or Beneficiary defaults on a Plan loan made pursuant to this Section and such loan is secured by the Participant&#8217;s interest in the Plan, then, to the extent provided in the Participant loan program, a Participant&#8217;s interest may be offset by the amount subject to the security to the extent there is a distributable event permitted by the Code or Regulations.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Loans subject to Plan terms.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;Notwithstanding anything in this Section to the contrary, any Plan loans made prior to the date this amendment and restatement is adopted shall be subject to the terms of the Plan in effect at the time such loan was made.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE VIII
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TOP&#8209;HEAVY
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TOP&#8209;HEAVY PLAN REQUIREMENTS
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Top&#8209;Heavy requirements.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;For any Top&#8209;Heavy Plan Year, the Plan shall provide the special vesting requirements of Code Section&#160;416(b) pursuant to Section&#160;6.4 of the Plan and the minimum required allocation of Code Section&#160;416(c) pursuant to Section&#160;4.4 of the Plan. 8.1(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Top&#8209;Heavy exemption.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;Notwithstanding the provisions of the previous subsection, the Top&#8209;Heavy Plan Year requirements of this Article and Code Section&#160;416 shall not apply in any Plan Year in which the Plan consists solely of ADP Test Safe Harbor Contributions which meet the requirements of Code Section&#160;401(k)(12), Matching Contributions which meet the requirements of Code Section 401(m)(11) and Elective Deferrals.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	DETERMINATION OF TOP&#8209;HEAVY STATU
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Definition of Top&#8209;Heavy Plan.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;This Plan shall be a Top&#8209;Heavy Plan if any of the following conditions exists:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	if the &#8220;top&#8209;heavy ratio&#8221; for this Plan exceeds sixty percent (60%) and this Plan is not part of any &#8220;required aggregation group&#8221; or &#8220;permissive aggregation group&#8221;;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(2)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	if this Plan is a part of a &#8220;required aggregation group&#8221; but not part of a &#8220;permissive aggregation group&#8221; and the &#8220;top&#8209;heavy ratio&#8221; for the group of plans exceeds sixty percent (60%); or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(3)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	if this Plan is a part of a &#8220;required aggregation group&#8221; and part of a &#8220;permissive aggregation group&#8221; and the &#8220;top&#8209;heavy ratio&#8221; for the &#8220;permissive aggregation group&#8221; exceeds sixty percent (60%).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Top&#8209;heavy ratio.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;&#8220;Top&#8209;heavy ratio&#8221; means, with respect to a &#8220;determination date&#8221;:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	If the Employer maintains one or more defined contribution plans (including any simplified employee pension plan (as defined in Code Section 408(k)) and the Employer has not maintained any defined benefit plan which during the 5&#8209;year period ending on the &#8220;determination date&#8221; has or has had accrued benefits, the top&#8209;heavy ratio for this plan alone or for the &#8220;required aggregation group&#8221; or &#8220;permissive aggregation group&#8221; as appropriate is a fraction, the numerator of which is the sum of the account balances of all Key Employees as of the &#8220;determination date&#8221; (including any part of any account balance distributed in the 1&#8209;year period ending on the &#8220;determination date&#8221;) (5&#8209;year period ending on the &#8220;determination date&#8221; in the case of a distribution made for a reason other than severance from employment, death or disability and in determining whether the Plan is top&#8209;heavy for Plan Years beginning before January 1, 2002), and the denominator of which is the sum of all account balances (including any part of any account balance distributed in the 1&#8209;year period ending on the &#8220;determination date&#8221;) (5&#8209;year period ending on the &#8220;determination date&#8221; in the case of a distribution made for a reason other than severance from employment, death or disability and in determining whether the Plan is top&#8209;heavy for Plan Years beginning before January 1, 2002), both computed in accordance with Code Section 416 and the Regulations thereunder.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage124"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Both the numerator and denominator of the top&#8209;heavy ratio are increased to reflect any contribution not actually made as of the &#8220;determination date,&#8221; but which is required to be taken into account on that date under Code Section 416 and the Regulations thereunder.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(2)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	If the Employer maintains one or more defined contribution plans (including any simplified employee pension plan) and the Employer maintains or has maintained one or more defined benefit plans which during the 5&#8209;year period ending on the &#8220;determination date&#8221; has or has had any accrued benefits, the top&#8209;heavy ratio for any &#8220;required aggregation group&#8221; or &#8220;permissive aggregation group&#8221; as appropriate is a fraction, the numerator of which is the sum of account balances under the aggregated defined contribution plan or plans for all Key Employees, determined in accordance with (1) above, and the present value of accrued benefits under the aggregated defined benefit plan or plans for all Key Employees as of the &#8220;determination date,&#8221; and the denominator of which is the sum of the account balances under the aggregated defined contribution plan or plans for all participants, determined in accordance with (1) above, and the present value of accrued benefits under the defined benefit plan or plans for all participants as of the &#8220;determination date,&#8221; all determined in accordance with Code Section 416 and the Regulations thereunder. The accrued benefits under a defined benefit plan in both the numerator and denominator of the top&#8209;heavy ratio are increased for any distribution of an accrued benefit made in the 1&#8209;year period ending on the &#8220;determination date&#8221; (5&#8209;year period ending on the &#8220;determination date&#8221; in the case of a distribution made for a reason other than severance from employment, death or disability and in determining whether the Plan is top&#8209;heavy for Plan Years beginning before January 1, 2002).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(3)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	For purposes of (1) and (2) above, the value of account balances and the present value of accrued benefits will be determined as of the most recent &#8220;valuation date&#8221; that falls within or ends with the 12&#8209;month period ending on the &#8220;determination date,&#8221; except as provided in Code Section 416 and the Regulations thereunder for the first and second plan years of a defined benefit plan. The account balances and accrued benefits of a participant (i) who is not a Key Employee but who was a Key Employee in a prior year, or (ii) who has not been credited with at least one Hour of Service with any Employer maintaining the plan at any time during the 1&#8209;year period (5&#8209;year period in determining whether the Plan is top&#8209;heavy for Plan Years beginning before January 1, 2002) ending on the &#8220;determination date&#8221; will be disregarded. The calculation of the top&#8209;heavy ratio, and the extent to which distributions, rollovers, and transfers are taken into account will be made in accordance with Code Section 416 and the Regulations thereunder. Deductible employee contributions will not be taken into account for purposes of computing the top&#8209;heavy ratio. When aggregating plans the value of account balances and accrued benefits will be calculated with reference to the &#8220;determination dates&#8221; that fall within the same calendar year.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The accrued benefit of a participant other than a Key Employee shall be determined under (i) the method, if any, that uniformly applies for accrual purposes under all defined benefit plans maintained by the employer, or (ii) if there is no such method, as if such benefit accrued not more rapidly than the slowest accrual rate permitted under the fractional rule of Code Section 411(b)(1)(C).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(4)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The calculation of top&#8209;heavy ratio, and the extent to which distributions, rollovers, and transfers are taken into account, will be made in accordance with Code Section 416 and the regulations thereunder.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Determination date.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;&#8220;Determination date&#8221; means, for any Plan Year subsequent to the first Plan Year, the last day of the preceding Plan Year. For the first Plan Year of the Plan, &#8220;determination date&#8221; means the last day of that Plan Year.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Permissive aggregation group.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;&#8220;Permissive aggregation group&#8221; means the &#8220;required aggregation group&#8221; of plans plus any other plan or plans of the Employer or any Affiliated Employer which, when considered as a group with the required aggregation group, would continue to satisfy the requirements of Code Sections 401(a)(4) and 410.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Required aggregation group.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;&#8220;Required aggregation group&#8221; means: (1) each qualified plan of the Employer or any Affiliated Employer in which at least one Key Employee participates or participated at any time during the Plan Year containing the determination date or any of the four preceding plan years (regardless of whether the plan has terminated), and (2) any other qualified plan of the Employer or any Affiliated Employer which enables a plan described in (l) to meet the requirements of Code Sections 401(a)(4) or 410.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(f)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Valuation Date.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;&#8220;Valuation date&#8221; means the date elected by the Employer as of which account balances or accrued benefits are valued for purposes of calculating the &#8220;top&#8209;heavy ratio.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE IX
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	EMPLOYEE STOCK OWNERSHIP PLAN PROVISIONS
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ESOP PROVISIONS.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The ESOP Allocations for all Participants shall be considered and designated as an employee stock ownership plan (collectively referred to as the &#8220;ESOP&#8221;). The purpose of the ESOP is to allocate to Participants and their Beneficiaries an ownership interest in the Company through distribution of Employer Securities (or the fair market value of Employer Securities) following a Participant&#8217;s Severance. Neither the
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage125"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Company, its officers, directors, Employees or shareholders, nor any fiduciary of the Plan shall have any responsibility for the value of any stock or other securities of the Company allocated to the Account of, or distributed to, any Participant or Beneficiary hereunder; it being understood that such stock or securities may decline in value or become wholly worthless due to risks and circumstances which cannot be foreseen and which may not be within the control of any such person or entities.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	INVESTMENT IN EMPLOYER SECURITIES
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	A principal purpose of the ESOP is to provide an avenue for Employees to acquire Company Stock. Accordingly, the Committee will follow the Participant&#8217;s election to invest in Company Stock by taking the Participant&#8217;s contributions made to the ESOP in cash and other cash received for the ESOP by the Trustee and investing primarily or exclusively in Company Stock. Purchases of Company Stock may be made in the open market or, to the extent permitted by law, by purchases directly from the Company or from shareholders of the Company. If Company Stock is not available for purchase, or if the Trustee determines that the purchase of additional Company Stock is not prudent or would not further the purposes of the Plan, the Trustee shall, to the extent not inconsistent with the Plan&#8217;s continued tax qualification as an employee stock ownership plan under Code Section 4975(e)(7), invest the assets of the ESOP in securities or investments other than Company Stock. The Trustee may maintain reserves in the Plan to provide funds (A) for the payment of expenses from the Trust, and (B) for distributions in cash. Such reserves may be invested in cash, savings accounts, certificates of deposit and other similar cash equivalent investments, including those of the Trustee, as well as any other authorized investment provided in the Trust. For accounting purposes the Company Stock and the cash reserve shall be combined into a unitized fund Company Stock fund. All purchases of Company Stock shall be made at prices, which, in the judgment of the Trustee, do not exceed the fair market value of such Company Stock at the time of purchase.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	DIVIDENDS ON COMPANY STOCK
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Dividends paid by the Company with respect to shares of Company Stock held by the ESOP shall, in the discretion of the Company, be (i) paid in cash directly to the Participants in the ESOP or their Beneficiaries, (ii) paid to the ESOP and distributed in cash to the Participants in the ESOP or their Beneficiaries no later than ninety days after the close of the Plan Year in which such dividends are paid, or (iii) at the election of each Participant in the ESOP or his Beneficiary, either (a) payable as provided in clause (i) or (ii) above, or (b) paid to the Plan and reinvested in Company Stock in the ESOP, as provided in Code Section 404(k) and accompanying regulations and guidance. A Participant&#8217;s election to receive cash payment of dividends on Company Stock as provided in this Section 9.3 shall be made in the manner and time indicated by the Committee.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Cash dividends received on shares of Company Stock will be allocated to the Participant&#8217;s ESOP Allocations in his Account based on the number of shares of Company Stock held in each such Account, unless the Participant elects to receive such dividends in cash pursuant to this Section.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The Participant shall in all cases be given the opportunity to elect to receive dividend distributions in the form of cash, or have those dividends reinvested in the Plan. If the Participant fails to specify his or her election on or before the date of the ex-dividend date, then the Participant will be deemed to have elected to have those dividends reinvested into his or her Account within the Plan.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ESOP DIVERSIFICATION
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	A Participant may, at his discretion, diversify his ESOP Allocations in his Account at any time in accordance with the Plan. Participants shall be provided complete instructions on their ability to diversify Employer Securities in accordance with all requirements of Section 401(a)(35).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	VOTING RIGHTS
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Each Participant or Beneficiary shall be entitled to direct the Trustee as to how to vote the shares of Company Stock that are allocated to his Account. The Committee will direct the Trustee as to the voting of the shares that have been allocated to Participants&#8217; Accounts but no direction has been received.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	FORMS OF DISTRIBUTION
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Subject to the provisions of paragraph (c), the Committee may, in its absolute discretion, determine whether a Participant&#8217;s Distributable Benefit shall be made in the form of Company Stock or in the form of cash.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#8220;Distributable Benefit&#8221; means a Participant&#8217;s total benefits in the Plan that is determined based on the number of shares of Company Stock allocated to the Participant&#8217;s Accounts, and by applying the value (if any) of his ESOP Allocations not invested in shares of Company Stock towards the purchase of Company Stock, with the objective of obtaining the maximum number of whole shares of Company Stock for distribution to the Participant by combining any fractional shares so acquired with any fractional shares credited to his Accounts.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	In the event that the Committee shall determine that a Participant&#8217;s Distributable Benefit is to be paid in the form of a cash distribution, the Committee shall notify the Participant in advance of making such a distribution. The Participant shall have a reasonable
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage126"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	period of time after receiving the notice, not to exceed two weeks without Committee approval, in which to elect instead to receive his Distributable Benefit in the form of Company Stock.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	PUT OPTION
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Solely in the event that a Distributee receives a distribution consisting in whole or in part of Company Stock that at the time of the distribution thereof is not Freely Tradeable Stock (or which ceases to be Freely Tradeable Stock during the time periods specified below), the distributed Company Stock shall be subject to a put option (&#8220;Put Option&#8221;) as set forth in this Section.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	For purposes of this Article VIII, &#8220;Distributee&#8221; means:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:72PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The Participant or Beneficiary (including an Alternate Payee under certain circumstances detailed herein) receiving the distribution of the Company Stock;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:72PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:72PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	(2)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Any other party to whom the stock is transferred by gift or by reason of death; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:72PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:72PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	(3)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The trustee of an individual retirement account (as defined under Code Section 408) or of a tax-qualified retirement plan to which all or any portion of the distributed Company Stock is transferred pursuant to a tax-free &#8220;rollover&#8221; transaction satisfying the requirements of Code Section 402.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#8220;Freely Tradeable Stock&#8221; means Company Stock that, at the time of reference is &#8220;Publicly Traded&#8221; as that term is defined under Treasury Regulation Section 54.4975-(b)(1)(iv) and is not subject to a &#8220;Trading Limitation&#8221; as that term is defined under Treasury Regulation Section 54.4975-7(b)(10).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	During the sixty (60) day period following the date the Company Stock first becomes distributable, the Distributee shall have the right to require the Company to purchase all or a portion of the distributed Company Stock held by the Distributee. A Distributee shall exercise this right by giving written notice to the Company of the number of shares of distributed Company Stock that the Distributee intends to sell to the Company. This notice must be given within the sixty (60) day period following the date the Company Stock first becomes distributable. The purchase price to be paid for the Company Stock shall be its fair market value determined as of the Valuation Date coincident with or immediately preceding the date of the distribution.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	If a Distributee does not exercise his Put Option right under paragraph (c), the option right shall temporarily lapse. Upon the expiration of the sixty (60) day period following the Accounting Date of the Plan Year in which the sixty (60) day option period expires, the Company shall provide the non-electing Distributee (if he is then a shareholder of record) with a notice (the &#8220;Notice of Value&#8221;) indicating the fair market value of the Company Stock, determined by an independent appraiser who meets the requirements of Code Section 401(a)(28)(C). During the sixty (60) day period following receipt of the Notice of Value, the Distributee shall have the right to require the Company to purchase all or any portion of the distributed Company Stock with the purchase price based on the amount stated in the Notice of Value. If a Distributee fails to exercise his option right under this paragraph with respect to any portion of the distributed Company Stock, no further options shall be applicable under this Plan with respect to the stock, and the Company shall have no further purchase obligations.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	(e)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	In the event that a Distributee shall exercise a Put Option, then the Company shall have the option of paying the purchase price of the Company Stock which is subject to the Put Option (&#8220;Option Stock&#8221;) under either of the following methods:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:72PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	A lump sum payment of the purchase price within thirty days after the date upon which the Put Option is exercised (&#8220;Exercise Date&#8221;); or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:72PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:72PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	(2)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	A series of six equal installment payments, with the first payment to be made within thirty days following the Exercise Date and the five remaining payments to be made on the five (5) anniversary dates of the Exercise Date.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	If the Company elects to pay the purchase price of the Option Stock under the installment method, the Company shall, within thirty days after the Exercise Date, give the Distributee the Company&#8217;s promissory note for the full, unpaid balance of the option price. This note shall provide adequate security, state a rate of interest reasonable under the circumstances, and provide that the full amount of the note shall accelerate and become due immediately in the event that the Company defaults in the payment of a scheduled installment payment.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	(f)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The Put Option shall be effective solely against the Company and shall not obligate the Plan in any manner. The Plan may, with the Company&#8217;s consent, elect to purchase any Company Stock that otherwise must be purchased by the Company pursuant to a Distributee&#8217;s exercise of his Put Option.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	(g)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Except as is expressly provided above with respect to any distributed Company Stock that is not Freely Tradeable Stock, no Participant shall have any Put Option rights with respect to Company Stock distributed under this Plan, and neither the Company nor this Plan shall have any obligation whatsoever to purchase any distributed Company Stock from any Participant or other Distributee.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">

</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	APPLICATION OF ARTICLE IX TO NON-ESOP ALLOCATION
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Notwithstanding anything in the Plan to the contrary, the provisions of Section 9.4, 9.5, 9.6 and 9.7 of this Article shall apply in full to the Non-ESOP Allocations.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE X
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	MISCELLANEOUS
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	10.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	PARTICIPANT&#8217;S RIGHTS
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	This Plan shall not be deemed to constitute a contract between the Employer and any Participant or to be a consideration or an inducement for the employment of any Participant or Employee. Nothing contained in this Plan shall be deemed to give any Participant or Employee the right to be retained in the service of the Employer or to interfere with the right of the Employer to discharge any Participant or Employee at any time regardless of the effect which such discharge shall have upon the Employee as a Participant of this Plan.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	10.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ALIENATION OF BENEFITS
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	General rule.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Subject to the exceptions provided below, and as otherwise permitted by the Code and the Act, no benefit which shall be payable to any person (including a Participant or the Participant&#8217;s Beneficiary) shall be subject in any manner to anticipation, alienation, sale, transfer, assignment, pledge, encumbrance, or charge, and any attempt to anticipate, alienate, sell, transfer, assign, pledge, encumber, or charge the same shall be void; and no such benefit shall in any manner be liable for, or subject to, the debts, contracts, liabilities, engagements, or torts of any such person, nor shall it be subject to attachment or legal process for or against such person, and the same shall not be recognized, except to such extent as may be required by law.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exception for loans.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Subsection (a) shall not apply to the extent a Participant or Beneficiary is indebted to the Plan, by reason of a loan made pursuant to Section&#160;7.4. At the time a distribution is to be made to or for a Participant&#8217;s or Beneficiary&#8217;s benefit, such proportion of the amount to be distributed as shall equal such indebtedness shall be paid to the Plan, to apply against or discharge such indebtedness. Prior to making a payment, however, the Participant or Beneficiary must be given written notice by the Administrator that such indebtedness is to be so paid in whole or part from the Participant&#8217;s Account. If the Participant or Beneficiary does not agree that the indebtedness is a valid claim against the Vested Participant&#8217;s Account, the Participant or Beneficiary shall be entitled to a review of the validity of the claim in accordance with procedures provided in Sections 2.8 and 2.9.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exception for QDRO.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Subsection (a) shall not apply to a qualified domestic relations order defined in Code Section&#160;414(p), and those other domestic relations orders permitted to be so treated by the Administrator under the provisions of the Retirement Equity Act of 1984. The Administrator shall establish a written procedure to determine the qualified status of domestic relations orders and to administer distributions under such qualified orders. Further, to the extent provided under a qualified domestic relations order, a former spouse of a Participant shall be treated as the spouse or surviving spouse for all purposes under the Plan.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exception for certain debts to Plan.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Subsection (a) shall not apply to an offset to a Participant&#8217;s accrued benefit against an amount that the Participant is ordered or required to pay the Plan with respect to a judgment, order, or decree issued, or a settlement entered into in accordance with Code Sections&#160;401(a)(13)(C) and (D).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	With respect to distributions from the Participant&#8217;s Pre&#8209;Retirement Survivor Annuity Account, if the Participant has a spouse at the time at which the offset is to be made:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	either such spouse has consented in writing to such offset and such consent is witnessed by a notary public or representative of the Plan (or it is established to the satisfaction of a Plan representative that such consent may not be obtained by reason of circumstances described in Code Section&#160;417(a)(2)(B)), or an election to waive the right of the spouse to either a qualified joint and survivor annuity or a qualified Pre&#8209;Retirement Survivor Annuity is in effect in accordance with the requirements of Code Section&#160;417(a),
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(2)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	such spouse is ordered or required in such judgment, order, decree or settlement to pay an amount to the Plan in connection with a violation of fiduciary duties, or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(3)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	in such judgment, order, decree or settlement, such spouse retains the right to receive the survivor annuity under a qualified joint and survivor annuity provided pursuant to Code Section&#160;401(a)(11)(A)(i) and under a qualified Pre&#8209;Retirement Survivor Annuity provided pursuant to Code Section&#160;401(a)(11)(A)(ii).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage128"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	10.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	CONSTRUCTION AND INTERPRETATION OF PLAN
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Applicable state laws.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;This Plan shall be construed and enforced according to the Code, the Act and the laws of the State of Texas, other than its laws respecting choice of law, to the extent not pre-empted by Federal law.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Single subsections.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;This Plan may contain single subsections. The existence of such single subsections shall not constitute scrivener&#8217;s errors.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Separate Accounts.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;Unless otherwise specified by a particular provision, the term &#8220;separate account&#8221; does not require a separate fund, only a notational entry in a recordkeeping system.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	10.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	GENDER AND NUMBER
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Masculine and feminine.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;Wherever any words are used herein in the masculine, feminine or neuter gender, they shall be construed as though they were also used in another gender in all cases where they would so apply.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Singular and plural.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;Whenever any words are used herein in the singular or plural form, they shall be construed as though they were also used in the other form in all cases where they would so apply.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	10.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LEGAL ACTION
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	In the event any claim, suit, or proceeding is brought regarding the Trust and/or Plan established hereunder to which the Trustee, the Employer or the Administrator may be a party, and such claim, suit, or proceeding is resolved in favor of the Trustee, the Employer or the Administrator, they shall be entitled to be reimbursed from the Trust Fund for any and all costs, attorney&#8217;s fees, and other expenses pertaining thereto incurred by them for which they shall have become liable.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	10.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	PROHIBITION AGAINST DIVERSION OF FUNDS
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	General rule.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;Except as provided below and otherwise specifically permitted by law, it shall be impossible by operation of the Plan or of the Trust, by termination of either, by power of revocation or amendment, by the happening of any contingency, by collateral arrangement or by any other means, for any part of the corpus or income of any Trust Fund maintained pursuant to the Plan or any funds contributed thereto to be used for, or diverted to, purposes other than the exclusive benefit of Participants or their Beneficiaries.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Mistake of fact.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;In the event the Employer shall make an excessive contribution under a mistake of fact pursuant to Act Section 403(c)(2)(A), the Employer may demand repayment of such excessive contribution at any time within one&#160;(1) year following the time of payment and the Trustees shall return such amount to the Employer within the one&#160;(1) year period. Earnings of the Plan attributable to the contributions may not be returned to the Employer but any losses attributable thereto must reduce the amount so returned.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Contribution conditioned on deductibility.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Except as otherwise provided by a particular Plan provision, any contribution by the Employer to the Plan is conditioned upon the deductibility of the contribution by the Employer under the Code and, to the extent any such deduction is disallowed, the Employer may, within one&#160;(1) year following the final determination of the disallowance, whether by agreement with the Internal Revenue Service or by final decision of a competent jurisdiction, demand repayment of such disallowed contribution and the Trustee shall return such contribution within one&#160;(1) year following the disallowance. Earnings of the Plan attributable to the contribution may not be returned to the Employer, but any losses attributable thereto must reduce the amount so returned.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	10.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	EMPLOYER&#8217;S AND TRUSTEE&#8217;S PROTECTIVE CLAUSE
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The Employer, Administrator and Trustee, and their successors, shall not be responsible for the validity of any Contract issued hereunder or for the failure on the part of the insurer to make payments provided by any such Contract, or for the action of any person which may delay payment or render a Contract null and void or unenforceable in whole or in part.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	10.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	INSURER&#8217;S PROTECTIVE CLAUSE
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Except as otherwise agreed upon in writing between the Employer and the insurer, an insurer which issues any Contracts hereunder shall not have any responsibility for the validity of this Plan or for the tax or legal aspects of this Plan. The insurer shall be protected and held harmless in acting in accordance with any written direction of the Trustee, and shall have no duty to see to the application of any funds paid to the Trustee, nor be required to question any actions directed by the Trustee. Regardless of any provision of this Plan, the insurer shall not be required to take or permit any action or allow any benefit or privilege contrary to the terms of any Contract which it issues hereunder, or the rules of the insurer.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
