<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	FIRST AMENDMENT
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	TO THE
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	OCEANEERING RETIREMENT INVESTMENT PLAN
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(As Amended and Restated Effective January 1, 2013)
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:232%;PADDING-TOP:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Pursuant to Section 7.1 of the Oceaneering Retirement Investment Plan (the &#8220;Plan&#8221;), Oceaneering International, Inc. hereby amends the Plan effective as of June 1, 2014 as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:-48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	The last paragraph of Section 1.33 shall be amended to read as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8220;For purposes of this Section, Hours of Service will be credited for employment with the following predecessor employers: Oceaneering Canada, Ltd., Nauticos Corporation; Reflange, Inc., Oceaneering Asset Integrity, Inc.; Grayloc Products, LLC, ABB Vetco Gray, Frog AGV Systems Inc., and AIRSIS.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:-48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	The third paragraph of Section 1.48 shall be amended to read as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8220;In addition, Periods of Service with Oceaneering Canada, Ltd.; Nauticos Corporation; Reflange, Inc.; Oceaneering Asset Integrity, Inc.; Grayloc Products, LLC; ABB Vetco Gray; Frog AGV Systems, Inc.; and AIRSIS shall be recognized for purposes of eligibility, vesting and allocations.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:-48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Section 4.8(a) shall be amended by adding the following to the end thereof:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8220;In addition, the Plan may accept rollovers of participant loans of participants who had a loan from one of the acquired plans of companies listed in the third paragraph of Section 1.48.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:232%;PADDING-TOP:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	IN WITNESS WHEREOF, Oceaneering International, Inc. has caused the First Amendment to the Oceaneering Retirement Investment Plan to be executed by its duly authorized officers on this 4th day of June, 2014, but to be effective as of June 1, 2014.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:336PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	OCEANEERING INTERNATIONAL, INC.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:336PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	By:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	/s/ MARVIN J. MIGURA

	Title: Executive Vice President

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECOND AMENDMENT
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TO THE
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	OCEANEERING RETIREMENT INVESTMENT PLAN
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(As Amended and Restated Effective January 1, 2013)
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:174%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Oceaneering International, Inc., a Delaware corporation (the &#8220;Company&#8221;), having established the Oceaneering Retirement Investment Plan, as amended and restated effective January 1, 2013, and as thereafter amended (the &#8220;Plan&#8221;), and having reserved the right under Section 7.1 thereof to amend the Plan, does hereby amend Section 6.11 of the Plan in its entirety, effective as of January 1, 2015, to read as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	6.11
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Pre-Retirement Distribution of Contributions
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	A Participant who is age 59&#189; or older and who has not severed employment with the Employer may elect, in the form and manner prescribed by the Administrator, to have the Administrator direct the Trustee to distribute all or a portion of the Participant&#8217;s Accounts that are vested. In the event that the Administrator makes such an in-service distribution, the Participant shall continue to be eligible to participate in the Plan on the same basis as any other Employee. Any distribution made pursuant to this Section shall be made in a lump sum payment and charged and withdrawn pro-rata from the Participant&#8217;s Accounts. Notwithstanding any provision in this Section to the contrary, to the extent any amounts attributable to a Participant&#8217;s Accounts collateralizes a loan under Section&#160;7.4, such collateralized amounts shall not be eligible for in-service withdrawal under this Section.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:174%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	IN WITNESS WHEREOF, Oceaneering International, Inc. has caused these presents to be executed by its duly authorized officer in a number of copies, all of which shall constitute one and the same instrument, which may be sufficiently evidenced by any executed copy hereof, on this 3rd day of December, 2014, but effective as of January 1, 2015.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:240PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:174%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Oceaneering International, Inc., a Delaware corporation (the &#8220;Company&#8221;), having established the Oceaneering Retirement Investment Plan, as amended and restated effective January 1, 2013, and as thereafter amended (the &#8220;Plan&#8221;), and having reserved the right under Section 7.1 thereof to amend the Plan, hereby amends the Plan, effective as of January 1, 2016, as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:174%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Article I of the Plan is hereby amended to add the following new definitions thereto in alphabetical order and renumber the remaining Sections in Article I (with all affected references in the Plan amended accordingly):
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8220;1.60
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#8216;Roth Contribution&#8217;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;means any contributions made to the Plan at the election of the Participant in lieu of cash Compensation as &#8220;Roth Contributions&#8221; pursuant to Section 4.2(c). The references to &#8220;Elective Deferrals&#8221; in the second and third sentences in the definition of &#8220;Elective Deferrals&#8221; in Section 1.17 shall be deeded to include a Participant&#8217;s Roth Contributions for any taxable year.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	1.61
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#8216;Roth Contribution Account&#8217;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	means the separate account established and maintained by the Administrator for each Participant with respect to the Participant&#8217;s total interest in the Plan resulting from Roth Contributions. Amounts in the Roth Contribution Account are nonforfeitable when made and are subject to the distribution restrictions of Section 4.2(d).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	1.62
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8216;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Roth Rollover Account
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8217; means a separate Rollover Account established and maintained by the Administrator for each Participant with respect to such Participant&#8217;s interest in the Plan resulting from the Participant&#8217;s Roth Rollover Contributions.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	1.63
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8216;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Roth Rollover Contributions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8217; means a rollover from another Roth account under an applicable retirement plan described in Code Section 402A(e)(1) by a Participant in accordance with Section 4.8(f).&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:174%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Section 1.1 of the Plan is hereby amended to redesignate clause &#8220;(f)&#8221; as clause &#8220;(h)&#8221; and reletter the remaining clauses in Section 1.1 (with all affected references in the Plan amended accordingly) and add the following new clauses &#8220;(f)&#8221; and &#8220;(g)&#8221;to read as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8220;(f)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	the Roth Contribution Account;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;(g)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	the Roth Rollover Account;&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:174%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	The first sentence in Section 1.8 of the Plan is hereby amended to read as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8220;1.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8216;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Catch-Up Contribution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8217; means, effective January 1, 2008, Elective Deferrals and, effective January 1, 2016, Roth Contributions made to the Plan by a Catch-Up Eligible Participant during any taxable year of such Participant that are in excess of:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage148"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	a statutory dollar limit on Elective Deferrals and Roth Contributions or Annual Additions as provided in Code Sections 401(a)(30), 402(h), 403(b), 408, 415(c), or 457(b)(2) (without regard to Code Section 457(b)(3)), as applicable; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Plan limit on Elective Deferrals and Roth Contributions which is not a limit provided in (a) above.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:174%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	The sentence immediately following clause (c) in the third paragraph of the definition of &#8220;Compensation&#8221; in Section 1.11 of the Plan is hereby amended to read as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8220;Compensation in excess of $200,000 (or such other amount provided in the Code) shall be disregarded for all purposes other than for purposes of salary deferral elections and/or Roth Contributions pursuant to Section 4.2.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:174%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Section 1.59 of the Plan is hereby amended to read as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:96PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8220;1.59
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8216;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Rollover Account
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8217; means the separate account established and maintained by the Administrator for each Participant with respect to such Participant&#8217;s interest in the Plan resulting from amounts that are rolled over from another plan or Individual Retirement Account in accordance with Section 4.8. Amounts in the Rollover Account are nonforfeitable when made. References to the term Rollover Account includes a separate Roth Rollover Account, except as otherwise provided.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:174%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	6.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Section 4.2 of the Plan is hereby amended to add the following new subsection (c) and renumber the remaining subsections in Section 4.2 (with all affected references in the Plan amended accordingly):
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8220;(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Qualified Roth Contributions.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;&#32;Effective January 1, 2016, a Participant may elect to irrevocably designate all or a portion of his Compensation that he would otherwise be eligible to defer as deferral elections as Roth Contributions as provided in this Section 4.2(c). This Section 4.2(c) is intended to meet the requirements of a &#8216;Qualified Roth Contribution Program&#8217; under Code Section 402A and the applicable Treasury Regulations and guidance issued by the Internal Revenue Service. A Participant&#8217;s Roth Contributions shall be in lieu of (and not in addition to) all or a portion of his Elective Deferrals contributed to the Plan for a payroll period and shall be elected in the form and manner prescribed by the Administrator.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Except as expressly provided in the Plan, notwithstanding any other provisions to the contrary, for purposes of the Plan, Roth Contributions shall be considered, treated and subject to the same requirements as Elective Deferrals, including, but not limited to, the requirements in this Section 4.2, except that:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	A Participant may elect that 0% to 80% (in whole percentages) of his Compensation for a payroll period be treated as a Roth Contribution; provided, however, that such amount would eligible to be contributed as a deferral elections and that the total of his Elective Deferrals and Roth Contributions shall not exceed 80% of his Compensation for any payroll period. A Participant may change his Roth Contribution percentage or cease making Roth Contributions in the same manner as he is permitted to make such changes for Elective Deferrals under the Plan.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage149"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(2)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Qualified Nonelective Contributions made to the Plan under Section 4.1(c) shall be limited solely to Elective Deferrals.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(3)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	If the Administrator determines that a Participant&#8217;s Elective Deferrals under the Plan should be reduced, or may be increased, the Administrator may permit the Participant to designate the application of such reduction or increase between the Participant&#8217;s Roth Contribution percentage and Elective Deferral percentage, if applicable.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(4)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	If a Participant has made Roth Contributions and/or Elective Deferrals during a Plan Year and Excess Contributions are distributable to the Participant under Section 4.5 for such Plan Year, such Excess Contribution amounts shall be distributed to the Participant first from the Participant&#8217;s Elective Deferral Account and second from the Participant&#8217;s Roth Contribution Account.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(5)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	For purposes of Section 6.15, if an eligible rollover distribution includes Roth Contribution amounts, the term eligible retirement savings plan means, with respect to such Roth Contribution amounts, a qualified trust described in Code Section 401(a) which separately accounts for such Roth Contributions or a Roth IRA as defined in Code Section 408A.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(6)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Roth Contributions shall be eligible for hardship and in-service withdrawals under Sections 6.11 and 6.12, respectively, and loans under Section 7.4.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(7)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	A Participant&#8217;s Roth Contributions, and any earnings and losses thereon, shall be allocated to the Participant&#8217;s Roth Contribution Account and shall be held in such account until such time as all amounts are withdrawn or distributed in accordance with the terms of the Plan.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(8)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Provided the requirements of Code Section 402A and the applicable Treasury Regulations and guidance issued by the Internal Revenue Service are satisfied, payment or distribution of amounts from a Participant&#8217;s Roth Contribution Account shall be treated as &#8216;Qualified Distributions&#8217; within the meaning of Code Section 402A(d)(2).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(9)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	If a Participant has made Roth Contributions and Elective Deferrals to the Plan during a Plan Year in which such Participant has Excess Deferrals, such Excess Deferral amounts shall be distributed to the Participant first from the Participant&#8217;s Elective Deferral Account and second from the Participant&#8217;s Roth Contribution Account.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:174%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	7.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Section 4.2(h) of the Plan (formerly subsection (j) prior to redesignation by Paragraph 6 above) is hereby amended to read as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8220;(h)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Procedures to implement Elective Deferrals and/or Roth Contributions.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;The Employer and the Administrator may adopt a procedure to implement the salary reduction elections for Elective Deferrals and Roth Contributions provided for herein. If such procedure is adopted, then the procedure shall include (and shall not be limited to) the following:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>

<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	A Participant must make an initial salary deferral election to make Elective Deferrals and/or Roth Contribution, or an election to receive cash in lieu of such salary deferral election, unless the Employer has implemented an automatic deferral election feature. If the Participant fails to make an initial salary deferral election to make Elective Deferrals and/or Roth Contribution, or an election to receive cash in lieu of a salary deferral election, if the automatic deferral election applies, then such Participant may thereafter make an election in accordance with the rules governing modifications. The Participant shall make such an election by entering into a salary reduction agreement with the Employer and filing such agreement with the Administrator. Such election shall initially be effective beginning with the pay period following the acceptance of the salary reduction agreement by the Administrator (or as soon thereafter as practical), shall not have retroactive effect and shall remain in force until revoked.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(2)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	A Participant may modify a prior salary deferral election to make Elective Deferrals and/or Roth Contribution at any time during the Plan Year and concurrently make a new election by filing a notice with the Administrator (in accordance with procedures established by the Administrator) within a reasonable time before the pay period for which such modification is to be effective. Any modification shall be implemented as soon as practical after being accepted by the Administrator, shall not have retroactive effect and shall remain in force until revoked.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(3)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	A Participant may elect to prospectively revoke the Participant&#8217;s salary reduction election in its entirety at any time during the Plan Year by providing the Administrator with thirty (30) days written notice of such revocation (or upon such shorter notice period as may be acceptable to the Administrator). Such revocation shall become effective as of the beginning of the first pay period coincident with or next following the expiration of the notice period (or as soon thereafter as practical).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(4)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Any notices or required actions under this Section 4.2(c) may be provided or made in accordance with Section 10.14.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:174%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	8.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Section 4.8 of the Plan is hereby amended to add the following new subsection (f) and renumber the remaining subsections in Section 4.8 (with all affected references in the Plan amended accordingly):
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8220;(f)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Requirements for Roth Rollover Contributions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. The Plan will accept a Roth Rollover Contribution to a Roth Rollover Account under this Plan if it is a direct rollover from another Roth elective deferral account under an applicable retirement plan described in Code Section 402A(e)(1) and only to the extent the rollover is permitted under the rules of Code Section 402(c). The Administrator, in its discretion, shall determine in every instance whether the foregoing criteria have been met prior to acceptance of any such contribution. The Administrator may request of the Eligible Employee any documents or evidence it deems necessary and may seek the advice of counsel to assist it in making such a determination. Roth Rollover Contributions shall be paid to the Trustee in cash or such other form of payment as may be approved by the Administrator in its discretion. A Roth Rollover Contribution shall be delivered to the Trustee as soon as practicable, but in no event later than 60 days after the amount thereof was received by the Eligible Employee. The Administrator or its delegate shall establish a Roth Rollover Account on behalf of the Eligible Employee to record the
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage151"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	amount of his or her Roth Rollover Contribution. An Eligible Employee&#8217;s Roth Rollover Account shall be 100% Vested at all times and shall not be subject to Forfeiture for any reason.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:174%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	9.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Section 4.8(g)(1) of the Plan (formerly subsection (f)(1) prior to redesignation by Paragraph 8 above) is hereby amended to read as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:96PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8220;(1)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	The term &#8216;rollover&#8217; means: (i) pre-tax amounts transferred to this Plan directly from another &#8220;eligible retirement plan;&#8221; (ii) pre-tax distributions received by an Employee from other &#8216;eligible retirement plans&#8217; which are eligible for tax-free rollover to an &#8216;eligible retirement plan&#8217; and which are transferred by the Employee to this Plan within sixty (60) days following receipt thereof; (iii) any other pre-tax amounts which are eligible to be rolled over to this Plan pursuant to the Code; and (iv) Roth 401(k) contributions transferred to this Plan directly from another &#8216;eligible retirement plan&#8217;. Rollovers to the Plan may not include after-tax contributions (other than Roth Rollover Contributions as provided in Section 4.8).&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:-48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	IN WITNESS WHEREOF, Oceaneering International, Inc. has caused these presents to be executed by its duly authorized officer in a number of copies, all of which shall constitute one and the same instrument, which may be sufficiently evidenced by any executed copy hereof, on this 5th day of October, 2015, but effective as of January 1, 2016.

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	FOURTH AMENDMENT
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TO THE
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	OCEANEERING RETIREMENT INVESTMENT PLAN
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(As Amended and Restated Effective January 1, 2013)
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:174%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Oceaneering International, Inc., a Delaware corporation (the &#8220;Company&#8221;), having established the Oceaneering Retirement Investment Plan, as amended and restated effective January 1, 2013, and as thereafter amended (the &#8220;Plan&#8221;), and having reserved the right under Section 7.1 thereof to amend the Plan, does hereby amend the Plan, effective as of January 1, 2016, to read as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	The last paragraph of Section 1.33 of the Plan is hereby to read as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8220;For purposes of this Section, Hours of Service will be credited for employment with the following predecessor employers: Oceaneering Canada, Ltd.; Nauticos Corporation; Reflange, Inc.; Oceaneering Asset Integrity, Inc.; Grayloc Products, LLC; ABB Vetco Gray; Frog AGV Systems Inc.; AIRSIS; and C &amp; C Technologies, Inc.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	The third paragraph of Section 1.48 of the Plan is hereby amended to read as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8220;In addition, Periods of Service with Oceaneering Canada, Ltd.; Nauticos Corporation; Reflange, Inc.; Oceaneering Asset Integrity, Inc.; Grayloc Products, LLC; ABB Vetco Gray; Frog AGV Systems Inc.; AIRSIS; and C &amp; C Technologies, Inc. shall be recognized for purposes of eligibility, vesting and allocations.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Section 3.1(a) of the Plan is hereby amended to add the following sentence to the end thereof:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8220;Notwithstanding the foregoing, an Eligible Employee who (i) was eligible to participate in the C &amp; C Technologies, Inc. 401(k) Profit Sharing Plan immediately prior to January 1, 2016 and (ii) is an Eligible Employee as of January 1, 2016 will be eligible to commence participation in the Plan as of January 1, 2016, regardless of whether a 3 month Period of Service has been completed as of such date.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	100%
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Any portion of a Participant&#8217;s C&amp;C Plan Matching Contributions and/or C&amp;C Plan Profit Sharing Contributions that are forfeited shall be Forfeitures subject to the applicable provisions of the Plan governing the treatment of Forfeitures.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:174%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	IN WITNESS WHEREOF, Oceaneering International, Inc. has caused these presents to be executed by its duly authorized officer in a number of copies, all of which shall constitute one and the same instrument, which may be sufficiently evidenced by any executed copy hereof, on this 27th day of October, 2015, but effective as of January 1, 2016.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:240PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">

	OCEANEERING INTERNATIONAL, INC.

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	FIFTH AMENDMENT
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TO THE
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	OCEANEERING RETIREMENT INVESTMENT PLAN
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(As Amended and Restated Effective January 1, 2013)
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:174%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Oceaneering International, Inc., a Delaware corporation (the &#8220;Company&#8221;), having established the Oceaneering Retirement Investment Plan, as amended and restated effective January 1, 2013, and as thereafter amended (the &#8220;Plan&#8221;), and having reserved the right under Section 7.1 thereof to amend the Plan, does hereby amend the Plan, effective as of the dates set forth below, to read as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:174%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Effective as of October 17, 2016:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:174%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	The last paragraph of the definition of &#8220;Hour of Service&#8221; in Section 1.33 of the Plan (prior to renumbering by Paragraphs 3 and 4 of this Amendment) is hereby amended to read as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8220;For purposes of this Section, Hours of Service will be credited for employment with the following predecessor employers: Oceaneering Canada, Ltd.; Nauticos Corporation; Reflange, Inc.; Oceaneering Asset Integrity, Inc.; Grayloc Products, LLC; ABB Vetco Gray; Frog AGV Systems Inc.; AIRSIS; C&amp;C Technologies, Inc.; and Blue Ocean Technologies, LLC.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:174%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8220;If the Administrator, pursuant to the claims review procedure, makes a final written determination denying a Participant&#8217;s or Beneficiary&#8217;s benefit claim, then in order to preserve the claim, the Participant or Beneficiary must file an action with respect to the denied claim not later than one hundred eighty (180) days following the date of the Administrator&#8217;s final determination, or the Participant&#8217;s or Beneficiary&#8217;s right to bring such a legal or equitable action will be waived. Further, a Participant or Beneficiary must exhaust all administrative remedies set forth in Sections 2.8 and 2.9 before the Participant or Beneficiary may bring any such legal or equitable action.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:174%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Section 4.1(a) of the Plan is hereby amended to read as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:96PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8220;(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Salary reductions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. The amount that all Participants&#8217; Compensation was reduced pursuant to (i) Section 4.2(a), which amount shall be Elective Deferrals and/or (ii) Section 4.2(c), which amount shall be Roth Contributions.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:174%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	11.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	The third sentence of Section 4.1(b) of the Plan is hereby amended to read as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8220;Participants who make Elective Deferrals and/or Roth Contributions at any time during the applicable payroll period shall be eligible to share in the allocation of the Matching Contributions.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:174%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">

	12.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Section 4.4(b) of the Plan is hereby amended to add a new clause (2) to read as follows and all subsequent clauses, and references thereto in the Plan, are renumbered accordingly:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_54"></A>

	&#8220;(2)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Roth Contributions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. With respect to the Roth Contributions made pursuant to Section 4.1(a), to each Participant&#8217;s Roth Contribution Account.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:174%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	13.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	The last sentence of Section 6.1 of the Plan is hereby amended to read as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8220;Upon a Participant&#8217;s Retirement Date, or as soon thereafter as is practicable, the Administrator shall direct the distribution, at the election of the Participant, of the Participant&#8217;s Vested interest in the Plan in accordance with Section 6.5.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:174%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	14.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	The second paragraph of Section 6.4(a) of the Plan is hereby amended to read as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8220;Distribution of the funds due to a Terminated Participant shall be made on the occurrence of an event which would result in a distributable event had the Terminated Participant remained in the employ of the Employer (upon the Participant&#8217;s death, Disability or Normal Retirement). However, at the election of the Participant, the Administrator shall direct the distribution of all or a portion (no less than $1,000) of the Vested portion of the Terminated Participant&#8217;s Account as soon as administratively feasible after termination of employment. Any distribution under this paragraph shall be made in a manner which is consistent with and satisfies the provisions of Section 6.5, including, but not limited to, all notice and consent requirements of Code Sections 417 and 411(a)(11) and the Regulations thereunder.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:174%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	15.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Section 6.4(b)(1) of the Plan is hereby amended to read as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<TD>
</TD>

	&#8220;(1)
</FONT>

</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	The Elective Deferral Account, Roth Contribution Account and the Qualified Nonelective Contribution Account shall be 100% Vested regardless of a Participant&#8217;s number of whole year Periods of Service.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:174%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	16.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	The first paragraph of Section 6.5 of the Plan is hereby amended to read as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8220;Unless otherwise elected by the Participant or the Beneficiary, the Plan will pay all distributable benefits in the form of a single lump sum payment of the Participant&#8217;s entire Vested Account or a partial distribution thereof not less than $1,000 (or the remainder of the Participant&#8217;s Vested Account), subject to the time restrictions for making payments under Section 6.8. If the Participant elects to receive a partial distribution, then the amount distributed shall be charged to, and paid from, the Terminated Participant&#8217;s Accounts on a pro-rata basis. The Participant or spousal Beneficiary may choose to have the account distributed in the form of equal installment payments. The installments may be paid in a monthly, quarterly or annual payment format at the election of the Participant or spousal Beneficiary, and the installments may extend over a period of time that does not exceed the time restrictions for making payments under Section 6.8.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:174%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	17.

<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION"></A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	CERTIFICATION
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	I,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	M. Kevin McEvoy
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, principal executive officer of Oceaneering International, Inc., certify that:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	I have reviewed this Annual Report on Form 10-K of Oceaneering International, Inc. for the year ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:-48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:-48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>

</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:-48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>

<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The registrant's other certifying officer(s) and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and have:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:-48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>

<TR>

	c)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant's disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	d)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant's internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant's most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant's fourth quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant's internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	5.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The registrant's other certifying officer(s) and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant's auditors and the audit committee of registrant's board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>

</FONT>

</TD>

</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Alan R. Curtis
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, principal financial officer of Oceaneering International, Inc., certify that:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2016

</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:-48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:-48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The registrant's other certifying officer(s) and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and have:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:-48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant's disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>

</TD>

	Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant's internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant's most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant's fourth quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant's internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>

	The registrant's other certifying officer(s) and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant's auditors and the audit committee of registrant's board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</TD>

</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:72PX;TEXT-INDENT:-24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<A NAME="eolPage164"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:72PX;">

	b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant's internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_3"></A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION&#160;906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In connection with the Annual Report of Oceaneering International, Inc. ("Oceaneering") on Form&#160;10-K for the year ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on the date hereof (the "Report"), I,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	M. Kevin McEvoy
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, principal executive officer, certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. &#167;&#160;1350, as adopted pursuant to &#167;906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;

<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_4"></A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	18 U.S.C. SECTION&#160;1350,
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION&#160;906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In connection with the Annual Report of Oceaneering International, Inc. ("Oceaneering") on Form&#160;10-K for the year ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on the date hereof (the "Report"), I,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Alan R. Curtis
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, principal financial officer, certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. &#167;&#160;1350, as adopted pursuant to &#167;906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>

</FONT>
</DIV>

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:VERDANA,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
